actionable_tasks.title: Complete MongoDB TTL Indexes
actionable_tasks.description: Finish implementing MongoDB TTL (Time-To-Live) indexes at 50% progress, as listed in 'In Progress (This Sprint)' with estimated completion Week 2 Jan. This optimizes data retention by automatically expiring old documents like logs or sessions.
implementation_steps: Identify collections needing TTL (e.g., logs, sessions, temp data)
Add indexes via MongoDB shell or driver: db.collection.createIndex({ "createdAt": 1 }, { expireAfterSeconds: 3600 })
Test expiration by inserting sample docs and verifying deletion after TTL
Update schema/docs and run npm run quality:check

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Testing Coverage to 70%
actionable_tasks.description: Increase automated test coverage from ~45% to >70% target, as marked [ ] in Medium Priority. Focus on Jest tests for MCP endpoints, providers health, and chat interface.
implementation_steps: Run coverage report: npm test -- --coverage
Add unit tests for untested functions in chat/Spotify integration (5-10 tests)
Cover edge cases like provider failover and OAuth errors
Integrate coverage thresholds in package.json scripts and verify

actionable_tasks.title: Finish Performance Monitoring (p50/p95 Tracking)
actionable_tasks.description: Complete at 40% progress by adding p50/p95 latency tracking to existing basic metrics, targeting API Response Time p95 <200ms.
implementation_steps: Use Prometheus or console.time() to capture p50/p95 percentiles
Instrument key endpoints (e.g., /api/search, LLM calls)
Log/export metrics to MongoDB dashboard
